edu.marist.mscs710.persistenceapi

Interface MetricsPersistenceService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SQLiteMetricsImpl

    public interface MetricsPersistenceService
    Provides a common interface for interacting with various database implementations for persisting Metric data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends MetricData>
      List<T>      		 getMetricsInRange(long earliest, long latest, Class<T> clazz)
      Retrieve metrics from the database within the specified time interval.
      List<String> getMetricTypes()
      Gets the metric types available in the database
      boolean persistMetric(Metric metric)
      Inserts the supplied Metric into the database.

    • Method Detail

      • persistMetric

        boolean persistMetric(Metric metric)
        Inserts the supplied Metric into the database.
        Parameters:
        metric - a Metric object
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful, false otherwise

      • getMetricTypes

        List<String> getMetricTypes()
        Gets the metric types available in the database
        Returns:
        list of metric types

      • getMetricsInRange

        <T extends MetricData> List<T> getMetricsInRange(long earliest,
                                                 long latest,
                                                 Class<T> clazz)
        Retrieve metrics from the database within the specified time interval. This
        Type Parameters:
        T - MetricData and its subtypes
        Parameters:
        earliest - epoch milli timestamp of the earliest record, inclusive
        latest - epoch milli timestamp of the latest record, exclusive
        clazz - class corresponding to metricType to hold the returned metric data
        Returns:
        list of metric data of type T
